project_tech_stack.text: HTML(5), CSS(3), SASS, SMACS, JavaScript & jQuery, Greensock

project_main_text.text: Two Fingers Brewing Co. is the only beer brand in Britain that gives back to the men that drink it, by giving all of its profits to Prostate Cancer UK. This brewing brand was formed by a group of men from advertising agency, Karmarama.  The website is a small static site, with subtle animation, to showcase the brand and give details of the stockists. At a later stage, the site will sell the beers and merchandise directly, which I will then integrate the site on Shopify.
